author: dicka
msg: Add in a check for MS VC v7 / v6 on Windows, to allow use of the correct compiler flags.

author: whitlock
msg: AXISCPP-737 Pass multiple references to the same attachment. The fix for AXISCPP-732 fixed this problem, but the expected tcpm.req file was slightly different from what was expected.

author: hawkeye
msg: Updated MockServer thread so that it always ensures that the response ends in "\r\n\r\n"

author: whitlock
msg: AXISCPP-732 Fix AttDataHandlerText. Separate out SoapAttachmentReference from SoapAttachment. For referenced attachments, this allows multiple references to point to the same attachment. This also allows client applications to reuse ISoapAttachment on multiple calls, since each call will create a separate SoapAttachmentReference.
